<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viking Weapon Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2097) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 198 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81)

**Prerequisites**
[Viking Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2096)

</column>

---

You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people. You gain the critical specialization effects of the [battle axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), and [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43). Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in the above four weapons.
name: Viking Weapon Specialist
